title: 02/04: Super Bowl Recap and Free Agency Preview (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It's over! Finally! The Super Bowl SnoozeFest has ended and we're here to recap the game and talk about the Fantasy values of each relevant Patriot (8:35) and Ram (21:30) in 2019. Is Tom Brady still capable of elite numbers? What will we get from Sony Michel? Is Julian Edelman a stud? Which LAR WR is the best? ... Some news and notes (31:00) from around the NFL and a free agency preview ... Talking about free agent QBs (36:00) and RBs (37:50). We'll debate Nick Foles, Le'Veon Bell, Mark Ingram, Tevin Coleman and more ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Recapping that boring Super Bowl and looking ahead to 2019. What are the Fantasy values of each relevant NE and LAR player? Can Tom Brady get back to being an elite Fantasy QB? We also take a look at free agent QBs and RBs.
